title: A Running Example (4/4)

definitions.Automatic Curriculum: A system that provides a structured learning path for a bot.
definitions.Iterative Prompting Mechanism: A process that allows a bot to learn through repeated interactions and feedback.
definitions.Skill Library: A collection of predefined skills that a bot can perform.

summary: The slide presents a running example of an AI system with an automatic curriculum, iterative prompting mechanism, and a skill library. It includes a code snippet for a combatZombie function and a diagram illustrating the process flow.
